facade

Class GHFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.GHFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.napier.geo.common.JourneyFactory, GHOptions

    public class GHFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.napier.geo.common.JourneyFactory, GHOptions
    Facade class for the simplified use of the GraphHopper routing engine Possibilities: - create a Journey that GH can handle (call getOptionsMap() first) - process the Journey object - create your own routing profile (e.g. bus) - create your own weighting for routing (e.g. eco efficient) - edit CustomWeighting
    Author:
    Jannik Enenkel
